content:
bear sb/sth out

to support the truth of something
為…作證，證明，證實


His version of events 
just isn't borne out by the facts.

他對事件的說法並未得到證實。


If you tell them what happened 
I will bear you out (on it).

如果你告訴他們所發生的事，
我會為你作證的。
excerpt: bear sb/sth out，to support the truth of something，為…作證，證明，證實，His version of events，just isn't borne
